info.name: Jamii Spot - Complete API Testing Collection
info.description:
ðŸŒ **Complete API Testing for Jamii Spot Backend**

This collection tests ALL features of the Jamii Spot travel discovery platform:

## ðŸŽ¯ **Core Vision**
Connecting people from the same home country when they visit another country

## ðŸ“‹ **Features Covered**
âœ… User Authentication & JWT
âœ… Profile Management & Travel Status
âœ… Friend Request System
âœ… Community Management
âœ… Story Posts (24-hour expiring media)
âœ… Real-time Messaging with E2E Encryption
âœ… Travel Discovery & Matching
âœ… Local Expert Finding
âœ… Emergency Network
âœ… WebSocket Notifications
âœ… Advanced Compatibility Scoring

## ðŸš€ **Quick Start**
1. Start Django server: `python manage.py runserver`
2. Import this collection
3. Run requests in order: Auth â†’ Profiles â†’ Discovery â†’ Messaging
4. Monitor WebSocket connections for real-time features

## ðŸ”‘ **Environment Variables**
This collection automatically manages JWT tokens for multiple test users

item.name: ðŸ” Core Discovery Features
item.description: The main travel discovery and matching features

request.description:
ðŸŽ¯ **CORE FEATURE**: Find people from your home country in your current location

**Algorithm:**
- Matches: same home_country + same current_city
- Excludes: requesting user
- Orders: by last login activity
- Shows: travel status, expertise, languages

**Returns:**
- Message with count found
- Location context
- Statistics breakdown
- Array of matching countrymate profiles

ðŸ”” **Triggers discovery activity notification**

ðŸ§­ **Find Local Experts**: Verified helpers with local knowledge

**Criteria:**
- is_local_expert = true
- is_available_to_help = true
- years_in_current_location >= 1
- In your current city

**Ordering:**
- By helper_rating (descending)
- By help_requests_fulfilled (descending)

**Use Cases:**
- Transportation guidance
- Food recommendations
- Cultural insights
- Emergency assistance
- Accommodation help

ðŸ‘¥ **Travel Buddy Matching**: Find travelers with overlapping dates

**Requirements:**
- User must have travel_status = 'traveling'
- Preferably with travel_start_date and travel_end_date

**Algorithm:**
- Same home_country + current_country
- travel_status = 'traveling'
- Overlapping travel dates (if available)

**Use Cases:**
- Split accommodation costs
- Group sightseeing
- Shared transportation
- Safety in numbers

exec: pm.test('Smart matches with compatibility scores', function () {

request.description:
ðŸŽ¯ **Smart Compatibility Algorithm**: AI-powered matching with scoring

**Compatibility Score Breakdown:**
- **Base (50)**: Same country + location
- **Travel Status (15-40)**: Complementary statuses
  - Traveler + Resident: +35
  - Traveler + Expat: +30
  - Traveler + Traveler (overlapping): +40
- **Languages (20 each)**: Common languages
- **Helper Bonus (25-40)**: Local expert or helper
- **Rating Bonus (30)**: Helper rating >= 4.0
- **Activity Bonus (10)**: Active in last 7 days

**Match Reasons Examples:**
- "From your home country"
- "Local expert available to help"
- "Fellow traveler with overlapping dates"
- "Speaks English, Swahili"
- "Highly rated helper (4.5/5.0)"

ðŸ†˜ **Emergency Network**: Quick access to trusted countrymates

**Criteria:**
- Same home_country
- Same current_city
- is_available_to_help = true
- user.is_active = true

**Ordering:**
- By helper_rating (highest first)
- By help_requests_fulfilled (most experienced first)

**Returns:** Top 10 potential emergency contacts

**Use Cases:**
- Medical emergencies
- Lost documents
- Safety concerns
- Urgent local guidance

ðŸ“Š **Location Analytics**: Community insights and statistics

**Provides:**
- Total countrymates in your area
- Breakdown by travel status:
  - travelers (visiting temporarily)
  - residents (permanent)
  - expats (living abroad long-term)
- Local experts count
- Available helpers count
- Global network size for your country
- Actionable insights and recommendations

item.name: âš™ï¸ Travel Status Management
item.description: Manage travel status and trigger notifications

request.description:
ðŸ”” **TRIGGERS REAL-TIME NOTIFICATIONS**

When you update your travel status, nearby countrymates receive notifications:

**Notification Types:**
- `countrymate_traveling_nearby`: When someone starts traveling in your area
- `travel_status_changed`: When someone changes their status

**Status Options:**
- `traveling`: Visiting temporarily
- `expat`: Living abroad long-term
- `resident`: Local resident
- `returning`: Returning home

**âš ï¸ IMPORTANT**: Connect to WebSocket first to see notifications!

âš™ï¸ **Update Helper Profile**: Modify availability and expertise

**Available Expertise Areas:**
- transportation (public transport, taxi, driving)
- food (restaurants, local cuisine, groceries)
- accommodation (hotels, rentals, neighborhoods)
- culture (customs, etiquette, traditions)
- shopping (markets, stores, bargaining)
- nightlife (bars, clubs, entertainment)
- healthcare (hospitals, insurance, pharmacies)
- education (schools, universities, courses)
- legal (visas, permits, documentation)
- sports (gyms, clubs, outdoor activities)

request.description:
ðŸŽ­ **Complete User Journey Test**

This simulates John's complete experience:
1. John (Kenyan traveler) arrives in London
2. Uses app to find countrymates
3. Discovers Mary (local expert) and David (travel buddy)
4. Can connect with both for different needs

**Success Criteria:**
- Finds other Kenyans in London
- Identifies Mary as local expert
- Identifies David as travel buddy
- Gets actionable statistics and insights
